name: Sword Scroller
description:
A game that u can play with your scroll wheel!

You can go into fullscreen to enjoy the full experience!

-------------------------CONTROLS-----------------------

Scrolling = Rotating the sword.

Middle Mouse Button =  Jump.

R = Reset.

-------------------IMPORTANT NOTE-------------------

The game is still in development. If you encounter bugs or glitches, you can submit them in the comments!

Good luck and have fun! :)

Baap Bv. Team
